verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:17
verses.text: Cursed be he that removeth his neighbour’s landmark. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:18
verses.text: Cursed be he that maketh the blind to wander out of the way. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:19
verses.text: Cursed be he that perverteth the judgment of the stranger, fatherless, and widow. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:20
verses.text: Cursed be he that lieth with his father’s wife; because he uncovereth his father’s skirt. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:21
verses.text: Cursed be he that lieth with any manner of beast. And all the people shall say, Amen.
